short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks the time you spend on each of your favorite websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internet time allows you to track how much time you spend on all of the websites you visit. Use it to prioritize your time working vs browsing or just to gain insight into your browsing habits.
